turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a venti iced americano, light ice, with 2 pumps white mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. I will get the coffee on my way to pick up the pizza. Where do you want to get pizza from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want Donatos pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which location should I call in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Call in the one on Main St. since it's faster.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. What is the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It will be one large cheese pizza and then a large chicken mariachi pizza without tomatoes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So two large pizzas; what kind of crust?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thin crust for both.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else you need?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, order two sides of ranch and extra sour cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, any soda to go with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure, let's get a variety. Order a Pepsi, Diet Pepsi, and a Sierra Mist.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, so that's three sodas, and two large, thin crust pizzas; one cheese, one chicken mariachi without tomatoes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Go ahead and make the chicken mariachi pizza with only half jalapeño.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, so a large, thin crust cheese pizza, a large, thin crust chicken mariachi without tomatoes and half jalapeño, a Pepsi, Diet Pepsi, Sierra Mist, two sides of ranch and extra sour cream. Is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that sounds good. Please put in the order now and let me know when you leave to pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, that sounds good. How do you want to do the payment?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: They have my payment information, and have them send the receipt via text to my phone.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I'll go place the order now and be back.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I've just called Donatos and your pizza order is complete and the pizzas will be ready for pickup in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I just got the receipt notification, thank you. Can you leave in 15 minutes to pick it up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I'll leave in 15 minutes to pick up the order and bring it back.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome.
